resources.string: Can not locate your Import directory. Make sure that your primary storage is properly installed into the device
Error occured while doing search in your Import directory

There were no CloudCoins found in your income folder. Please put your CloudCoins (.jpg or .stack) files in your income folder and try again. Your Income folder can be found on your primary storage at:\n\n%1$s

Import will import all CloudCoin files from your Import folder. Please put all your CloudCoin files (.jpg and .stack) into the Import folder located on your primary storage at:

%1$s

We are going to import %2$d file(s). Tap OK to continue
Counterfeit or failed and moved to Trash
Please check your CloudCoin Trash \n for a note about what happened
Global error. Coins have not been exported
Coins have been exported successfully\nYou can find them on your primary storage at:\n%1$s
We are fixing coins now. Please, try again later
